title: When is the tribunal getting here.
body:
Tl;dr quitting lol till people actually get banned when you report them.
id quit it indefinitely but too much money spent.


Honestly im done.

Ive spent upwards of $200 in skins, possibly even closer to $500.

But the sheer quantity of troll and absolute retards that are still allowed to play ranked.

Makes me want to quit.

Ive considered it previously on many occasions, under the pretense that an elo hell doesnt exist.

But i just went from fucking b3 promos down to b4 0lp

in a matter of hours.

And i wasnt there by chance oh no.

i can hold my own up there, fuck ive won lane against a d5 hecarim, (his names elmo) im not just another bronzetard being all "wah wah i cant get out of bronze" but when you get 5 fucking games in a row with trolls.

And for some god damn reason everyone after 9pm wants to open up their glue bottles and suddenly forget the adc is supposed to build ad, not rush a hex drinker into tabi boots.

Or that going 1/11 is a surefire way to win.

Or that 2 mid and 3 smites is a viable strat.

Just makes you want to neck someone, and quit this fucking shithole of a region.

I played on na, i know damn well its better over there.

Like fuck we have our own pro league, why the fuck are we still getting shafted.

Why the fuck do we not have the most basic of services that would fix most of the toxicity in this community.

Which is a fucking functional reporting system.

replies.body:
Oh and before someone mentions the automatic systems.

Ive been on a low prio queue i know they exist.

I also know you get punished for avoiding trolls (the reason i was on a low prio queue was dodging 4/5 games)

Hell its reached the point where if you want to have an enjoyable experience playing the game you have to either A. play bots where no one can fuck up (god forbid)

or B dodge 6 times in a row till your team seems to be atleast semi competent, and even then you still have to haul ass to carry them, AND they could be toxic players anyway, play fine dont gank them that one time, doesnt matter how good they are, they will throw your game for you.
